title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4ยง 2.1 - Exempt class
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4ยง 2.1 - Exempt class

State Regulations
(a) Positions in
the exempt class are those, other than unskilled labor positions, for which
competitive or noncompetitive examinations or other qualification requirements
are not practicable. (b) Positions
in the exempt class shal be listed in Appendix 1 of these rules and made a part
hereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4ยง
2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
